Title: The Debt Collector (No. 46)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Kim Newton (teleplay by), Daniel Cerone (teleplay by), Jon Bokenkamp (story by), Lukas Reiter (story by)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Amir Arison
Plot: When Liz becomes the target of a mercenary, the Debt Collector, Red turns to an unlikely source for help. Meanwhile, Ressler faces a complication in his efforts to stay ahead of Gale's investigation.
